meanings.sent1: I need to reweigh the package to make sure it is not too heavy.
meanings.sent2: Can you reweigh the apples to check if they are ripe?
meanings.sent3: After the cat kept jumping on the scale, I had to reweigh myself.
meanings.sent4: She had to reweigh her options before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The scientist had to reweigh the sample to confirm the results.

meanings.definition: To determine the weight of something again.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler will reweigh the gold to calculate its value.
meanings.sent2: Please reweigh the luggage to avoid any extra charges at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to reweigh the flour after accidentally adding too much.
meanings.sent4: She had to reweigh her suitcase to meet the weight limit.
meanings.sent5: The doctor had to reweigh the patient to monitor their progress.
